body_html:
Hi @mlazarew, yes TF v1.8 still has the issue (latest tagged release as of now). But I have got some good news: this has been fixed internally, using @cczhong11 's cnn code above.
We are upstreaming the changes, hopefully the fix can appear in v1.9 or v1.10 the latest.

Below shows the log as a FYI:
Using TensorFlow backend.
Epoch 1/3
2018-06-29 13:41:45.164183: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
2018-06-29 13:41:45.183727: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/process_util.cc:69] Creating new thread pool with default inter op setting: 2. Tune using inter_op_parallelism_threads for best performance.

  • 55s - loss: 0.4636 - acc: 0.7518
    Epoch 2/3
  • 55s - loss: 0.1737 - acc: 0.9376
    Epoch 3/3
  • 53s - loss: 0.0580 - acc: 0.9832
    Accuracy: 86.28%

body:
Hi @mlazarew,  yes TF v1.8 still has the issue (latest tagged release as of now). But I have got some good news: this has been fixed internally, using @cczhong11 's cnn code above.  
**We are upstreaming the changes, hopefully the fix can appear in v1.9 or v1.10 the latest.** 

Below shows the log as a FYI:
Using TensorFlow backend.
Epoch 1/3
2018-06-29 13:41:45.164183: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
2018-06-29 13:41:45.183727: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/process_util.cc:69] Creating new thread pool with default inter op setting: 2. Tune using inter_op_parallelism_threads for best performance.
 - 55s - loss: 0.4636 - acc: 0.7518
Epoch 2/3
 - 55s - loss: 0.1737 - acc: 0.9376
Epoch 3/3
 - 53s - loss: 0.0580 - acc: 0.9832
Accuracy: 86.28%
